project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions. The game will keep track of the user's score and display it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Define quiz questions and multiple-choice answers in a variable
Implement function to display questions and choices to the user
Implement function to capture user's answer and update the score
Implement function to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the functions above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure that they function correctly
